quote: I have always had a sense that we are all pretty much alone in life, particularly in adolescence.
name: Robert Cormier

quote: For people who are really talented, what you don't say becomes extremely important. You have to judge what to say and what to leave alone so you can let the talent develop.
name: Itzhak Perlman

quote: Time and space - time to be alone, space to move about - these may well become the great scarcities of tomorrow.
name: Edwin Way Teale

quote: We are never the same with others as when we are alone. We are different, even when we are in the dark with them.
name: Maurice Maeterlinck

quote: You ask me if I will not be glad when the last battle is fought, so far as the country is concerned I, of course, must wish for peace, and will be glad when the war is ended, but if I answer for myself alone, I must say that I shall regret to see the war end.
name: George Armstrong Custer

quote: The population forecast for the United States in 1970 is 170 million. The population forecast for Russia alone in 1970 is 251 million. The implications are clear.
name: Emanuel Celler

quote: I do read books. I suppose it's more or less the same thing, but at least I'm alone and I'm an individual. I can stop anytime I want, which I frequently do.
name: Jack Vance

quote: I've always been shocked and waiting-for-the-other-shoe-to-drop that a girl would ever talk to me, let alone want to marry me. They always seem to hold the power to me, and from my mother to my wife to my daughter, every time I try to really figure them out, and think I've got them pegged, I pay for it.
name: Andrew Stanton

quote: I talked about the barriers created by monopolies. I said that it was the role of government to break up these monopolies and that we couldn't do it alone.
name: Joichi Ito

quote: Most photographers work best alone, myself included.
name: Elliott Erwitt

quote: It proved easier to buy the farm to get the mineral rights than to buy the coal rights alone.
name: Orville Redenbacher

quote: No matter how close to yours another's steps have grown, in the end there is one dance you'll do alone.
name: Jackson Browne

quote: Absolute truth belongs to Thee alone.
name: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing

quote: Research and development needs permanent tax credits to build the technology that spurs our growth. But no government programs alone can get America's students to study more science and math parents must push and help their children to meet this goal.
name: Ernest Istook

quote: The next thing I wrote was in a writing class at night school. It was about a poor woman who worked at a dime store and who was all alone for Christmas in Laurel, Mississippi.
name: Beth Henley

quote: My brother and Lauren are very close with me and they are in Sun Valley, so sometimes I need to go there and feel their presence. And there are times I need to see my bro' alone.
name: Picabo Street

quote: What's important is promising something to the people, not actually keeping those promises. The people have always lived on hope alone.
name: Hermann Broch

quote: For a while I couldn't leave the house by myself. Even if I was just grocery shopping alone, I'd get self-conscious.
name: Shannen Doherty

quote: Words alone cannot fully convey the realities of the soul or the greatness of the human spirit.
name: William Shirley

quote: Let there be no mistake. A gay man alone could never begin to replicate the inner workings of the female mind.
name: Michael Patrick King

quote: The great increase of our population throughout the Union will alone produce an important effect, and in no quarter will it be so sensibly felt as in those in contemplation.
name: James Monroe

quote: Alone is a much better film than House of the Dead and better than most horror movies out today.
name: Uwe Boll

quote: I think Alone in the Dark was too much an action creature movie than a horror creature movie.
name: Uwe Boll

quote: When I'm online, I'm alone in a room, tapping on a keyboard, staring at a cathode-ray tube.
name: Clifford Stoll

quote: I like to have a massage therapist come to my house, get a massage, take a bath, go to bed. That's a perfect night alone for me.
name: Stacy Keibler

quote: I'm fortunate that I've been in this business long enough that I've earned the right to be left alone by my record company.
name: Don Henley

quote: We are very anxious to bring the Jews of Morocco over and we are doing all we can to achieve this. But we cannot count on the Jews of Morocco alone to build the country, because they have not been educated for this.
name: Moshe Sharett

quote: When I work alone, it can be like dabbling with a canvas. Maybe you paint over bits, and it starts to form its own life and lead you off in a direction. It becomes an intuitive, subconscious process.
name: Lindsey Buckingham

quote: When I work alone, my process is like painting. With Fleetwood Mac, it's more like movie making.
name: Lindsey Buckingham

quote: Success doesn't necessarily come from breakthrough innovation but from flawless execution. A great strategy alone won't win a game or a battle the win comes from basic blocking and tackling.
name: Naveen Jain

quote: Some people can sometimes really invade your space and kind of never leave you alone.
name: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

quote: Now that I have found someone, I'm feeling more alone... than I ever have before.
name: Ben Folds

quote: Thus, the poet's word is beginning to strike forcefully upon the hearts of all men, while absolute men of letters think that they alone live in the real world.
name: Salvatore Quasimodo

quote: If I lived alone, Mom'd never sleep because she wouldn't know I was okay.
name: Scott Baio

quote: I didn't need clothes. I was allowed the opportunity to act out moments you don't get the opportunity to experience in your own life, let alone as a character in a film. I didn't feel naked.
name: Marguerite Moreau

quote: Say not that honor is the child of boldness, nor believe thou that the hazard of life alone can pay the price of it: it is not to the action that it is due, but to the manner of performing it.
name: Akhenaton

quote: Some of us may just, in one-on-one conversations with our family, with our friends, over the back fence with our neighbors, talk about the reality of our lives and realize that we're not alone, that we have a right to be physically safe and emotionally safe in our own homes.
name: Patricia Ireland

quote: Hiking is the best workout!... You can hike for three hours and not even realize you're working out. And, hiking alone lets me have some time to myself.
name: Jamie Luner

quote: I can barely remember what I wrote yesterday, let alone 10 years ago.
name: Andrew Sullivan

quote: I can support going in after Saddam Hussein, but I want to make sure I don't go alone.
name: John Dingell

quote: I spend my life essentially alone at a computer. That doesn't change. I have the same challenges every day.
name: Dan Brown

quote: Something about Texas I'm not proud of is that our state murdered 37 people last year alone.
name: Richard Linklater

quote: For each one of us stands alone in the midst of a universe.
name: John Buchanan Robinson

quote: I have two ideas for novels at the moment, neither of them all that conventional, but I'm not ready to choose between them yet, let alone settle down to the process of writing.
name: Jonathan Coe

quote: You are forever alone.
name: John Buchanan Robinson

quote: I think the idea that you can go this alone is - was a huge mistake. And unfortunately, there was a price paid in terms of suffering and pain for people in New Orleans.
name: Michael Chertoff

quote: Your thoughts and emotions are yours alone.
name: John Buchanan Robinson

quote: But the wicked passions of men's hearts alone seem strong enough to leave pictures that persist the good are ever too luke-warm.
name: Algernon H. Blackwood
